name: Admin Dashboard
description: Provides a sortable table view of various reports on REDCap metadata (users, projects, etc). Includes a number of built-in reports as well as support for custom SQL queries.

authors.name: Izzy Neuhaus
authors.institution: University of Iowa Institute for Clinical and Translational Science

system-settings.name: Use versionless URLs for easier bookmarking (disable to fix issues with Shibboleth authentication)
